description: Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in TRENDnet TEW-755AP 1.11B03, TEW-755AP2KAC 1.11B03, TEW-821DAP2KAC 1.11B03, and TEW-825DAP 1.11B03, which could let a remote malicious user cause a denial of service by sending a POST request to apply_cgi via an action ping_test without a ping_ipaddr key.
